text: “tavada ‘mā pariśūddhavantayeki’ yayi (māva mama ma praśaṁsā) kara gænīmaṭa pæmiṇiyē næta. mandayat magē deviyan dayāva pahaḷa kaḷahot misa, (minisungē) sit pāpayan karana men poḷam̆bavannaṭa hækkak vaśayenma ættēya. niyata vaśayenma magē deviyan itāmat kṣamā karanneku hā karuṇāvantayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya” (yayi kīvēya)
